author: A M

text: i love the music in this game. vary underrated but the battle theme is my favorite
author: BioPhoenix

text:
oh yeah, eveything in this game sounds like high-fantasy kirby, it's great. Second Armageddon (the final boss theme) in particular is really awesome.

 the game itself is alright if you dig 1st person dungeon crawlers. battles are really slow and all the dungeons are kinda bland mazes, but it's still pretty dang fun.
author: Rm Wolfe

text: Woohoo! Some Arcana love. I swear I thought I was the only person in the world that actually had fond memories of this game
author: Gorilla Games

text: A solid first person RPG by HAL with a great soundtrack by Ishikawa. 0:26 instantly reminds me of his work on Kirby. The instrumentation is great as well, there's just something about that SNES sound!
author: SupraDarky

text: +SupraDarky If only HAL would other games besides Kirby. Like how about another RPG or shooter?
